title: Why has Korean pop music exploded internationally in 2019? - Quora

response.answer_text: It has not particularly exploded in 2019 if you ask me. It’s been roughly doubling in the west every year since 2015, and if you look at the venue sizes played by BTS (who were almost 3/4ths of the US market last year according to the article I linked) that is basically what’s happening again this year. It’s just reached a cutoff point where western media is taking it seriously.
